shots.prompt: Cinematic shot, eye-level, medium close-up of Ava (30s, shoulder-length messy blonde hair, tired blue eyes, wearing a slightly rumpled grey blazer over a white blouse, professional but unfocused) hunched over her laptop in a modern, sunlit coffee shop. Sunlight streams from a large window, creating a soft, warm backlight. Shallow depth of field, bokeh in the background showing blurred patrons and the espresso machine's steam. Focus on Ava's furrowed brow and intense concentration.
